body.p: The Board observed that the essential characteristics of intangible assets are that they:

li.p: are resources controlled by the entity from which future economic benefits are expected to flow to the entity;

body.p: The Board concluded that the purpose for which an entity holds an item with these characteristics is not relevant to its classification as an intangible asset, and that all such items should be within the scope of the Standard.
